2075750.name: XSpeed
2075750.description:
Created using Unreal Engine 5, X-Speed will be a fast paced and high octane car racing game.

The game will eventually recreate 10 tracks from around the world.

Seven of these race tracks are from the original 1950s Grand Prix season which include:

- Silverstone, Monte Carlo, Indianapolis, Bremgarten, Spa, Reims-Gueuxa and Monza

There will also be 3 bonus tracks:

- Rio, Tokyo, and Istanbul

We are making this game free to play and welcome feedback from the public so we can improve.

There will be frequent updates to the game as we develop the game.
